title: Resurrection of Jesus
summary: The resurrection of Jesus (Greek: ανάσταση του Ιησού) is the Christian belief that God raised Jesus on the third day[note 1] after his crucifixion, starting – or restoring[web 1][note 2] – his exalted life as Christ and Lord.[web 2] According to the New Testament writings he was firstborn from the dead, ushering in the Kingdom of God.[1][web 2] He appeared to his disciples, calling the apostles to the Great Commission of proclaiming the Gospel of eternal salvation through his death and resurrection,[note 3] and ascended to Heaven.
